title: Macromolecules as components of plasma membrane 1

content.description:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin.

Membranes are essential components of all cells.
content.question: Identify THREE macromolecules that are components of the plasma membrane in a eukaryotic cell and discuss the structure and function of each.

frqParts.text: Identify THREE macromolecules that are components of the plasma membrane in a eukaryotic cell and discuss the structure and function of each.

skill.text: 1.C: Explain biological concepts and processes in applied contexts.
